title.native: オオカミ少女と黒王子

description:
The story centers around Erika Shinohara, a vain 16-year-old girl who tells her friends about her romantic exploits, but she actually has no boyfriend. She claims that a handsome boy in a candid photo is her boyfriend, but it turns out that boy is a schoolmate named Kyouya Sata. She has no choice but to make him her fake boyfriend. Unfortunately, Sata may look like a sweet person, but he is actually an ultra-black-hearted sadist. Sata takes advantage of Erika's weakness and treats her like his dog.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Fake Relationship
tags.description: When two characters enter a fake relationship that mutually benefits one or both involved.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/EineLotta) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@einelotta) | [Twitch](https://twitch.tv/einelotta/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/einelotta/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz5iaRIzFC2firx7Gwj46qA)

Charlotte Uhlig is a German Voice Actress and VTuber.

[Website](http://www.orsm.jp/) | [Profile (Sinsekai Studio)](https://sinsekaistudio.jp/artist/oresama/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/o_oresama)

ORESAMA is a musical duo that has been active since 2014. Their music is a mix of 80's disco, funk and electro. 

They are currently affiliated with Sinsekai Studio.

**Members:**
- [Pon](https://anilist.co/staff/301227/) (Lead Vo., Lyricist)
-  [Hideya Kojima](https://anilist.co/staff/158432) (Vo., Trackmaker)
